video.title: House Hunters Collection
video.synopsis: Prospective buyers and their realtors deal with both the practical and the emotional repercussions of finding and purchasing their dream home.

episodes.synopsis: Jennipher has her heart set on a historic Victorian home in Helena, Montana. But her fiancé, Brian, is partial to a more budget-friendly craftsman.
episodes.title: Historic in Helena

episodes.synopsis: Heather and Adam hope to start a family in their new home. He's looking for a big backyard, while she's more focused on finding something with charm.
episodes.title: Challenge in Charleston

episodes.synopsis: Mike's working with a big budget, but finding a spacious home with custom details in San Francisco is tough for even the most well-heeled home seeker.
episodes.title: Finding the Old and New

episodes.synopsis: While Heather's hoping for a classic colonial home, her husband, Joe, would prefer something contemporary with a big yard and plenty of privacy.
episodes.title: Classic vs. Cool in Upstate NY

episodes.synopsis: Worried that an old house could be haunted, Amanda insists on brand-new construction. But her husband's priority is finding an energy-efficient home.
episodes.title: Brand-New Near Boston

episodes.synopsis: Expectant parents Mike and Danielle need a bigger house for their new addition, but they have a limited budget and can't seem to agree on anything.
episodes.title: Make Room for Baby

episodes.synopsis: Desmond and Lauren are eager to make the transition from a tiny rental to a house with a big garage, but their expectations far exceed their budget.
episodes.title: Car Lovers Seek Garage Space

episodes.synopsis: Colleen, a young New York banker, thinks she can get more bang for her buck with a Queens fixer, but her mother wants her to buy a place in Manhattan.
episodes.title: New York Nomad

episodes.synopsis: After moving from Michigan to Las Vegas to help start a church, DeShon and Cynthia want to buy a big house for their growing family.
episodes.title: Mama Wants a Casita

episodes.synopsis: Single mom Chira brings a friend along to keep her on budget as she searches for her first home in Brevard County, Florida.
episodes.title: Under Budget and Overjoyed

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Greg don't see eye to eye on their budget -- or their ideal home. Randy wants a ranch, while Greg would prefer something more classic.
episodes.title: Turn-key vs. Fixer in DC

episodes.synopsis: Hawaii native Caine hopes to buy a houseboat on Seattle's Lake Union, but he may have to make some sacrifices to stay within his budget.
episodes.title: Planting Roots on a Houseboat

episodes.synopsis: Chicago couple Ali and Josh want to stay in the city. But she's got her eye on a fancy high-rise, while he'd like a comfy single-family home.
episodes.title: Determined to Stay in the City

episodes.synopsis: Marcus and Jennifer are eager to leave their starter home behind. He wants a house with a backyard, garage and game room, but she's all about style.
episodes.title: Family 'Forever Home' Found

episodes.synopsis: With a baby on the way, Megan and Stephen are in a hurry to find a new home in Dallas. She wants a condo, but he'd rather buy something vintage.
episodes.title: Rush to Nest in Dallas

episodes.synopsis: In Hawaii, a naval officer wants to live near his post at Pearl Harbor, while his wife hopes for a plantation-style house that's close tothe beach.
episodes.title: Hawaii Here We Come

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds Larrishia and Cameron are looking for a house that has plenty of space to do arts and crafts, but they're working with a limited budget.
episodes.title: All Brick or Bust in Columbia

episodes.synopsis: Single mom LaKechia has been saving up for her dream home in the Atlanta suburbs, but she's got a long list of requirements and a modest budget.
episodes.title: Georgia Dreamin'

episodes.synopsis: Seth and Keri have a big budget but different ideas about how to spend it. He wants to live on a golf course, while she'd rather be on the beach.
episodes.title: Surf vs. Turf in Florida

episodes.synopsis: Globe-trotters Fabio and Rafaelle are searching for a modern Atlanta home that's close to shops and restaurants and spacious enough for houseguests.
episodes.title: Modern vs. European Charm

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds look for a luxurious home on the California coast that's big enough for their five children and a collection of sports cars.
episodes.title: Picky in the Palisades

episodes.synopsis: Robbi and Ray want to relocate from New York City to the tranquil Hudson Valley, but Ray has a few oddly specific items on his wish list.
episodes.title: Seeking Prom Picture Perfect

episodes.synopsis: A family looking for a bigger living space relocates from New York to Arizona, but finding a home that fits the bill is tougher than they expected.
episodes.title: NY Studio to AZ Palace

episodes.synopsis: Now that Octave and Paul are ready to adopt a child, they need a new home. But they're not in sync about how to maximize their modest budget.
episodes.title: House Before Baby

episodes.synopsis: A widowed mother returns to her hometown of Nashville and searches for a dream house that includes two master closets, an open kitchen and more.
episodes.title: New Start in Nashville
